fields.name: TopicId
fields.about: The unique ID of this topic.

fields.name: Replicas
fields.about: The replicas of this partition, sorted by preferred order.

fields.name: Isr
fields.about: The in-sync replicas of this partition

fields.name: RemovingReplicas
fields.about: The replicas that we are in the process of removing.

fields.name: AddingReplicas
fields.about: The replicas that we are in the process of adding.

fields.name: Leader
fields.about: The lead replica, or -1 if there is no leader.

fields.name: LeaderEpoch
fields.about: An epoch that gets incremented each time we change the ISR.
